description: So far everything works great. Just needs dark mode so I don't blind myself at night.

I like the simplicity, but a few modifications/settings would be nice:
* The possibility to disable the info if a number is correct/incorrect: If i accidentally enter a number and by chance it is correct, i will have gained info I do not want
* Sometimes it is hard to pinpoint the cursor, maybe give it a blue border (Or make the colors user definable for color blind people)
* The given numbers are hard to differentiate from the entered numbers, maybe give them a gray background
Beyound that: nice and simple app for a quick round of Sudoku, keep up the great work!
summary: Simple UI (great) but gives too much information

description: Spielidee ist hervorragend, nur wenn ich es einige male gespielt habe, kann ich es nicht mehr starten. Auch neue booten bringt nichts. Deinstalliere und neu installieren bringt auch nichts

Из плюсов можно отметить: приятный интерфейс, интуитивное взаимодействие, а также быстрые установку и запуск.
Из минусов только невозможность играть только мышью, но может я просто не нашёл эту функцию.
Ожидания оправданы.
